attributes.action: Award Chris Whitty a knighthood for services to the nation
attributes.additional_details: Award a knighthood to Chris Whitty
attributes.background: For over a year Britain has been in the medical hands of professor Chris Whitty and we think he deserves a knighthood for his work.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
